rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with a small reception area and storage.
Open-plan living room adjoining the central courtyard and art deco styled interior finishes.
Dining area with integrated storage and seating arrangement.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout, including a breakfast nook adjoining the living room.
Spacious bedroom with east exposure for positive energy and a private balcony.
Spacious bedroom with west exposure, ensuring balance of Vastu principles, along with a private balcony.
Modern bathroom with sufficient ventilation and natural lighting from adjacent courtyard.

openings.description: Central North-facing entrance leading into the reception hall. Ensures positive Vastu flow and welcoming atmosphere.
Balconies on each bedroom open to a central courtyard, ensuring natural light and cross ventilation.
Private balcony door leading to the spacious east-facing balcony for Bedroom 1.
Private balcony door leading to the well-ventilated west-facing balcony for Bedroom 2.
